program: Master of Science (MS) in Engineering – Thayer School of Engineering

sections.text: The MS in Engineering provides advanced study and research training in engineering, culminating in a thesis under faculty supervision.
Students combine advanced coursework with independent research culminating in a thesis.

items: Bachelor’s degree in engineering, physics, or related science
sections.text: Applicants must demonstrate strong technical preparation, typically through an undergraduate engineering or related science degree.
Graduates continue into PhD programs or R&D careers in technology and engineering.
